content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, nice to meet you. I'm looking forward to discussing the rental price of the apartment. Please tell me what you have in mind.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. I'm glad to have this opportunity. I've seen similar apartments in the area, and I believe a fair price would be around 750 Euros per month, including all utilities. This is a reasonable offer considering the size and location of the apartment.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: 750 Euros per month, including all utilities, you say? I'll consider your offer and get back to you shortly.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mr. Heine. I appreciate your time and consideration. I'm looking forward to your response.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: After careful consideration, I'm willing to accept your offer of 750 Euros per month, including all utilities. I agree to the price of 750 Euro.
name: Heinrich Heine
